
# Pikatchu's_Fault
## Description:
I have a pretty weird girlfriend, she gave me a device to decrypt her secret messages to me.
She said not to worry it is an efficient RSA implementation using CRT - whatever.

One time my pikatchu got an uncommon cold and sneezed exacty when I fed her secret message to the decryptor.
I got unreadable nonsense as a result I suspect it's my pikatchu's fault for having an electric sneeze and it confused the decryptor.
My confidence about it raised after I tried to decrypt again and got a readable message.

I wonder though if it is possible to get the private key from that faulty message.

```
N: 
e: 65537
M: 
M`: 
```
